0000000_01100_00000_000_00001_0010011 //R0 + 12 -> R1
0000000_00000_00010_000_00010_0110011 //R2 + R0 -> R2
0000000_00001_00010_000_00010_0010011 //R2 + 1 -> R2
1000000_00001_00010_001_00001_1100011 //bne R1, R2,-2
0000000_00000_00000_000_00010_0110011 //R0 + R0 -> R2
xxxxxxx_xxxxx_xxxxx_xxx_xxxxx_xxxxxxx
